comment: Only the 1st test and the final are in-class. Everything else (2nd test, homework, quizzes, etc.) is on Connect. If you don't understand something on Connect, Chegg has the all problems! The final was difficult, but the extra credit she gives is enough to raise you 5 points! Don't miss any Connect assignments and you should pass.

comment: The best ACCT class to take. Everything except 2 test are on connect. You can find answers to quizzes, some tests, all hw, all activities online. There is a lot of extra credit. Enough to boost your grade a whole grade. Acct is difficult but this is the class to take. Great Prof, Easy A with a little effort. She really makes it so easy to get an A.

TAKE HER! Best accounting teacher ever! She's very accessible outside of class and goes over everything you might not get. Second time teaching but she comes from a great accounting background. Extra Credit on connect and just an awesome professor! YOU WILL NOT REGRET!
just go to class, she gives so much extra credit!!! best professor ive ever had

comment: One of my favorite professors ever. She owns her own CPA business so she is able to include real world examples and tips. She cares about her students and gives lots of extra credit. Very accessible outside of class. Strongly recommend.

prof balentine is an extremely nice lady who truly cares that everyone understands the material. gives lots of examples and many extra credit opportunities. final replaces lowest test grade but is cumulative.
Really takes the time to explain the material and helps students with any questions they may have. As long as you study and come to class you'll do well.

comment: Go to class, she will go into good detail and answer questions. Reviews some of the homework in class too. Gave extra credit in Connect, but didn't curve tests. comment: There are 2 Tests each worth 18% and a final worth 25%. there is also learnsmart assignments, homework for each chapter, and learning activities all on Connect (Access code). She gives a ton of extra credit and gives class time to let anyone ask any questions they have.

comment: She tries to make accounting as easy as possible. Tons of study opportunities online for tests. Explains things very clearly. Tests are very similar to the practice exam on connect. She really wants her class to understand concepts rather than just how to do it. 10/10 would take her again.
Would take again. Not heavy on lecture but gives a lot of examples. Available if you need extra help, and offers extra credit.
